title: It’s Not That I Like Using a Blunt Weapon! - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Shoujo Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Adopted Protagonist   Adventurers   Bullying   Clever Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Discrimination   Elves   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Lack of Common Sense   Level System   Management   Multiple POV   Naive Protagonist   Nobles   Overpowered Protagonist   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Sword And Magic   Underestimated Protagonist   Unique Weapons
author: Yamada Donki   山田どんき
description:
ーーーIs there any blunt weapon shining in your heart?

I’m Hanna Falsett, an ordinary girl who dreams of becoming an adventurer.

But, because I’m so slow and clumsy, my classmates and even the chairman made fun of me. I was even kicked out of the school.

I found a construction site when I was driven to the point of starvation. I picked up a hammer I found there, and suddenly, my talent bloomed!

Not only useful for blacksmithing and building constructions, but my【Blunt Weapon】skill I got was also useful for fighting. With this skill, I’ll show you that I’m also able to grow splendidly!

Defeating dragons, building shops, saving the countryー

The adventure of me with blunt weapons, using blunt weapons, for blunt weapons, begins!

Actually, I want a sword though…….. but I promise, I won’t say it again!>
